attributes.action: To allow the retention of European Citizenship at the end of Transition in 2021
attributes.additional_details:
The Government states those who voted Leave in the 2016 EU referendum wanted the UK to trade as an independent and sovereign Nation.
Whereas the primary reason for voting Remain is to keep European Citizenship. There is no reason why those who voted Leave should stop those who voted Remain in keeping their European Citizenship
attributes.background: Allow those who voted Remain in the 2016 EU referendum, alongside others should be able to retain their European Citizenship, and not be forced to become subjects at the end of transition in 2021

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301343
